data: At ten o’clock on this morning Captain Ablewhite, unannounced, and without knocking at the door, walked into Jeremiah’s room in the hotel at which he had taken up his quarters.
At ten o'clock on this morning Captain Ablewhite, unannounced, and without knocking at the door, walked into Jeremiah's room in the hotel at which he had taken up his quarters.
